title: Heart disease
brief_description: Neil created this story as a document of how surviving a heart attack completely changed his life. Created as part of ‘The Heart of the Story / Telling Stories, Building Communities’ Digital Storytelling Project ACMI in association with the National Heart Foundation of Australia (Victorian Division) and supported by Vic Health.
